name: LEADALLWAY 5 Step Ladder with Handrails (Include Tool Tray+Bag) 330lbs Capacity
short_description: Flexible Design: 5 step ladder top comes with a removable tool bag and tool tray, with it, you no longer need to climb up and down to get your tools while working, you can just put them in the tool bag or tool tray. The tool bag is designed with multiple compartments and made of waterproof Oxford cloth.They can be removed when you don't need them

Friendly Design: This is our senior-friendly feature, two additional foam-padded side handrails. Not only do they make climbing easier and less laborious, but they also add extra safety to the use of the four step ladder. Tip: Sponge packaging materials may be squeezed and leave marks during transportation. If you mind, please purchase with caution

Anti-Slip: Anti-slip texture is designed into the pedals to give more friction and bring you more peace of mind. The rubber feet on the bottom are in full contact with the ground, which increases friction while protecting your home's wooden floors from scratches

Stable: The five step ladder is made of stable steel frame structure . The metal beam in the center is designed with a solid triangular structure that increases the ladder's weight capacity and stability. The standing platform measures 14" X 10.4" and can hold up to 330 LBs of weight. Meanwhile the handrails are attached with a combination of washers and nuts, making your climb more stable and secure

Foldable: When you don't need to use folding step stool, fold the 5 step ladder up and store it against a wall or in a corner without taking up too much space. All you need to do is tilt the ladder slightly and release the safety latch at the top to fold it up easily
Tip: If the ladder is a bit wobbly after being extended, you can refer to the video on the homepage for manual adjustment.
